info.name: 10fastfingers minimalistic dark/light theme
info.description: A minimalistic theme for 10fastfingers. It'll be easier to edit in future versions and will include multiple color presets. This one is just a preview in order to see how it will be accepted by the 10FF community.
info.additionalInfo:
This theme is fairly NEW and it changes functionality by a huge margin therefore if you encounter a bug or something doesn't work properly, you're free to yell at me on the Gosu chat @Mikey or report a problem in the Feedback section below.

I've been working on this theme and re-designing 10FF for over two years on a multiple occasions but never actually made a complete theme that is public.

If you are missing first result box, you will need to turn off the adblock you use because result element is located under advertisement element.. but don't worry, with the *magic* of CSS the ads are blocked and the result box should be visible once again.

If your font doesn't look the same as mine, it's because I'm using a custom font that is called Proxima Nova. You'll have to pay for the font in order to use it, find a workaround to get it or use your own font by changing 'Proxima Nova' into any font you like, i.e. 'Helvetica' or use Arial by default.
